00018 //KDE headers
00019 #include <kapplication.h>
00020 #include <kaboutdata.h>
00021 #include <kcmdlineargs.h>
00022 #include <KDE/KLocale>
00023 #include <kuniqueapplication.h>
00024 #include <kdebug.h>
00025 
00026 //KShowmail headers
00027 #include "kshowmail.h"
00028 #include "uniqueapp.h"
00029 
00030 static const char description[] = I18N_NOOP("A pop3 mail checker");
00031 
00032 static const char version[] = "4.0";
00033 
00040 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00041 {
00042   //some things about KShowmail
00043   KAboutData about( "kshowmail", 0, ki18n( "KShowmail" ), version, ki18n( description ),
00044                     KAboutData::License_GPL, ki18n("(C) 2000 - 2005 Eggert Ehmke\n(C) 2006 - 2009 Ulrich Weigelt"), KLocalizedString(),
00045                     "http://kshowmail.sourceforge.net", "ulrich.weigelt@gmx.de");
00046 
00047   //add authors
00048   about.addAuthor( ki18n( "Eggert Ehmke" ), ki18n( "Initiator and first developer" ), "eggert.ehmke@berlin.de", "http://kshowmail.sourceforge.net" );
00049   about.addAuthor( ki18n( "Ulrich Weigelt" ), ki18n( "current developer" ), "ulrich.weigelt@gmx.de" );
00050   about.addAuthor( ki18n( "Allistar Melville" ), KLocalizedString(), "allistar@silvermoon.co.nz" );
00051   about.addAuthor( ki18n( "Oleg Ivanov" ), KLocalizedString(), "saruman@unigsm.com" );
00052 
00053   //add Translators
00054   about.setTranslator( ki18nc( "NAME OF TRANSLATORS", "Your names" ), ki18nc( "EMAIL OF TRANSLATORS", "Your emails" ) );
00055 
00056   //Initialize command line arguments
00057   KCmdLineArgs::init( argc, argv, &about );
00058 
00059   //add special command line options for unique KDE applications
00060   KUniqueApplication::addCmdLineOptions();
00061 
00062   //test whether the new application to start is unique
00063   if( KUniqueApplication::start() )
00064   {
00065     //yes, wa can start a unique kshowmail instance
00066 
00067     //create a new unique application
00068     //UniqueApp is a inherited class of KUniqueApplication
00069     //see uniqueapp.h
00070     UniqueApp* app = new UniqueApp();
00071 
00072     //start the application
00073     return app->exec();
00074   }
00075   else
00076   {
00077     //kshowmail is already running
00078     kWarning() << I18N_NOOP( "KShowmail is already running!" ) << endl;
00079   }
00080 
00081   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00082 }
